title: Ryusui vs. Senku
description: As the new Kingdom of Science rises, Senku and Ryusui clash in a test of genius, innovation, and willpower on their journey to restore humanity.

title: Science Journey
description: Senku and his team set off on a scientific voyage to uncover the mysteries left by humanity’s past civilization.

title: Light Trap in the Darkness
description: A mysterious trap endangers the team, forcing Senku to use his wits to illuminate the truth hidden in the shadows.

title: Dr. X
description: Senku meets a mysterious scientist known as Dr. X—someone who may hold the key to reviving civilization or ending it.

title: Doctor vs. Doctor
description: Two brilliant scientists face off in a battle of inventions that could decide the fate of the world.

title: Science Is Elegant
description: Senku demonstrates the elegance of science as he races against time to prevent a catastrophe.

title: The Two Scientists
description: Senku teams up with an unlikely ally, revealing that two great minds can sometimes save more than one world.

title: Lock On
description: The Kingdom of Science zeroes in on their next big target—a weapon of intellect and precision.

title: Light of Science
description: Senku unveils a new scientific creation that pushes humanity closer to reclaiming its lost brilliance.

title: Dirty Roads
description: Traveling rough paths, the crew faces the harsh realities of rebuilding civilization from the ground up.

title: Those Who Know the Rules; Those Who Make Them
description: As the world reforms, Senku learns that knowledge and power often clash in unexpected ways.

title: Reunion
description: A long-awaited reunion sparks a renewed hope for the Kingdom of Science and its mission.

title: Watching at the Same Moon
description: Separated by distance but united by purpose, Senku’s team looks to the sky for answers.

title: Earth Race
description: The race to save humanity begins—both on land and across the oceans.

title: The Escape
description: Senku and his allies must execute a daring plan to escape the clutches of their enemies.
